Scripts.OnLoad:
self:SetClampedToScreen( true ) self:RegisterForDrag( "LeftButton" ) self:SetScript( "OnDragStart", self.StartMoving ) self:SetScript( "OnDragStop", self.StopMovingOrSizing ) self:SetScale( 1.2 ) self:SetUserPlaced( true ) self:Hide()
-- create trait buttons self.traits = {} for i = 1,5 do self.traits[i] = CreateFrame( "DiceMasterTraitButton", nil, self ) self.traits[i]:SetSize( 24, 24 ) self.traits[i]:SetPoint( "TOP", -56 + 28*(i-1), 24 ) self.traits[i].traitIndex = i end

self:SetTexture( "Interface/AddOns/DiceMaster/Texture/health-heart" ) DiceMaster4.SetupTooltip( self, nil, "Health", nil, nil, nil, "Represents the total number of defense roll failures the player may endure before they are defeated." )
